ayah: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
ayah_translit: hal fi dhalika qasamun lidhi hij'rin
ayah_english: Is in that an oath for those who understand

ayah: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ
ayah_translit: fa-amma al-insanu idha ma ib'talahu rabbuhu fa-akramahu wana'amahu fayaqulu rabbi akramani
ayah_english: And as for man when does try him his Lord and is generous to him and favors him he says My Lord has honored me

ayah: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
ayah_translit: wa-amma idha ma ib'talahu faqadara alayhi riz'qahu fayaqulu rabbi ahanani
ayah_english: But when does He try him and restricts for him his provision then he says My Lord (has) humiliated me

ayah: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: wajia yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insanu wa-anna lahu al-dhik'ra
ayah_english: And is brought that Day Hell That Day will remember man but how (will be) for him the remembrance

ayah: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: wajia yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insanu wa-anna lahu al-dhik'ra
ayah_english: And is brought that Day Hell That Day will remember man but how (will be) for him the remembrance

ayah: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: wajia yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insanu wa-anna lahu al-dhik'ra
ayah_english: And is brought that Day Hell That Day will remember man but how (will be) for him the remembrance

ayah: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: wajia yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insanu wa-anna lahu al-dhik'ra
ayah_english: And is brought that Day Hell That Day will remember man but how (will be) for him the remembrance

ayah: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: wajia yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insanu wa-anna lahu al-dhik'ra
ayah_english: And is brought that Day Hell That Day will remember man but how (will be) for him the remembrance
He will say O! I wish I had sent forth for my life
He will say O! I wish I had sent forth for my life
He will say O! I wish I had sent forth for my life
He will say O! I wish I had sent forth for my life
So that Day not will punish (as) His punishment anyone
So that Day not will punish (as) His punishment anyone
So that Day not will punish (as) His punishment anyone
So that Day not will punish (as) His punishment anyone
So that Day not will punish (as) His punishment anyone
And not will bind (as) His binding anyone
And not will bind (as) His binding anyone
And not will bind (as) His binding anyone
And not will bind (as) His binding anyone
O soul who is satisfied
O soul who is satisfied
O soul who is satisfied
Return to your Lord well pleased and pleasing
Return to your Lord well pleased and pleasing
Return to your Lord well pleased and pleasing
Return to your Lord well pleased and pleasing
Return to your Lord well pleased and pleasing
So enter among My slaves
So enter among My slaves
So enter among My slaves
And enter My Paradise
And enter My Paradise
